renderComponent

public abstract <T extends UIComponent> T renderComponent(RenderingContext context,
                                                          UIComponent parent,
                                                          T component)
Render the component by determining the render automatically. The RenderKit will first try to find a matching UIRender by the component Id. If none is found will try to find it using the components type.

renderComponent

public abstract <T extends UIComponent> T renderComponent(UIRender render,
                                                          RenderingContext context,
                                                          UIComponent parent,
                                                          T component)
Render the component using the given UIRender.

Parameters:
render - the render to use
context - the current RenderingContext
parent - the already rendered parent component.
component - the not rendered component.
Returns:

getRender

public abstract <T extends UIComponent> UIRender getRender(java.lang.Class<T> componentType,
                                                           java.lang.String familly)
Find the appropriate Render for the given component type The search is made in this order:
1) Find the component's familly. If its null or and empty string the default familly is used 2) Look in the renders familly for the choosen render

Parameters:
renderType -
Returns:
the appropriate Render for the given component type or null is none is found.

addRender

public abstract <T extends UIComponent> void addRender(UIRender render,
                                                       java.lang.Class<T> componentType,
                                                       java.lang.String familly)
Register an UIRender for a specific Component Type and family

Parameters:
render - therender to register
componentType - the component type to register it on.
familly - the family of the component

setRender

public abstract void setRender(UIRender render,
                               java.lang.String componentID)
Registers an UIRender for a specific component. This UIRender will only be used for this component an takes precedence over any render defined for the component type.

Parameters:
render - the render to register
componentID - the id of the component.

getRender

public abstract UIRender getRender(java.lang.String componentID)
Retruns the registed UIRender for the component with the given id, or null if no UIRender was registered.

Parameters:
componentID - the component ID.
Returns:
the registed UIRender for the component with the given id, or null if no UIRender was registered.

getUnitConverted

public abstract UIUnitConverter getUnitConverted()
Returns:
UIUnitConverter for the rendering tencology

Returns:
SceneNavigator for the rendering tencology
